sentences.en: ...a coat with a huge beaver collar.
sentences.cn: …一件带有大海狸毛皮领的大衣。

sentences.en: A beaver looking for a building site is very choosy.
sentences.cn: 河狸寻找造窝的场所时是很挑剔的.

sentences.en: Ask young Harry to do it — he's still an eager beaver and wants to impress by his willingness.
sentences.cn: 请年轻的亨利干吧——他仍然是个雄心勃勃的人,并努力使人对他的投入留下深刻印象.

sentences.en: Beaver comes back tomorrow and you get to go home.
sentences.cn: 海狸明天就回来了,你也要会家了.

sentences.en: BEAVER: Don't worry Mister Groundhog, we'll get the job done.
sentences.cn: 海狸: 放心吧,土拨鼠先生, 我们会把活儿都干完的.

sentences.en: Beaver: Oh look, Henry! Your favorite! Nice juicy clover!
sentences.cn: 看啊, 亨利! 这是你最喜欢的! 鲜美多汁的苜宿!

sentences.en: Being an eager beaver, he sometimes is not well - liked by his colleagues.
sentences.cn: (他做事异常卖力, 有时不受同事喜欢. )

sentences.en: Being eager beaver, he sometimes is not well - liked by his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他做事非常卖力, 有时不受同事的喜欢.

sentences.en: By coincidence or other wise, the largest channel is exposed in the Beaver Divide escarpment.
sentences.cn: 由于巧合或其他原因, 最大通道在比佛迪维特陡壁区出露的位置.

sentences.en: Does Mr. B HAs a long - continuing attitude as an eager beaver?
sentences.cn: B男士做事 非 比寻常卖力,那是长久以来的态度 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is a place of age, this mind, this beaver pond.
sentences.cn: 一块岁月的土地, 这种思想, 这个海狸池塘.

sentences.en: Some people say we Briton must work like beaver.
sentences.cn: 有人说我们英国人得拼命工作才行.

sentences.en: The beaver lives both on land and in water.
sentences.cn: 海狸既能在陆上生活也能在水里生活.

sentences.en: The man is an eager beaver.
These young people beaver away at school.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人在学校里用功苦读.

phrases.tran_cn: 做事非常卖力气的人，做事勤奋的人（特别指做事过于卖力气以讨好上司的人）

trans.tran_cn: 河狸，河狸毛皮，[印]海狸绒布，工作勤恳的人
trans.tran_en: a North American animal that has thick fur and a wide flat tail, and cuts down trees with its teeth
